item.description:
Hi All,

   Another Meetup Group, "Friends in Motion" plays VB every Wednesday night at Coolidge Park in Fitchburg.  Last week was the first game and we all had a blast!  We are hoping to get more players to join the fun while getting some great exercise.  Come and join us!

 If you park in the upper parking lot the court is located behind a structure in the middle of the field. If you park in the lower parking lot by the playground, walk past the playground along the track and look to your left until you see the court
item.how_to_find_us: The VB net is in the middle of the field
item.name: Volleyball at Coolidge Park in Fitchburg!
